body_html: @F3PiX @carpodaster As per the tsv format I'm a bit concerned about it. It's not very well-known; many applications can't export to tsv (e.g. Numbers). It will probably work for now, but I don't know if it will be convenient for future generations.
body_text: @F3PiX @carpodaster As per the tsv format I'm a bit concerned about it. It's not very well-known; many applications can't export to tsv (e.g. Numbers). It will probably work for now, but I don't know if it will be convenient for future generations.
body: @F3PiX @carpodaster As per the tsv format I'm a bit concerned about it. It's not very well-known; many applications can't export to tsv (e.g. Numbers). It will probably work for now, but I don't know if it will be convenient for future generations.
